name: Stay Alight
description: Become a world savior in the new arcade game — Stay Alight®! Meet the adventurous Mr. Bulb, who will free the planet from the cartoonish microbes with your help. The green meanies have conquered the planet completely and utterly, so it’s up to Mr.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 1.0GB of video RAM. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Really nice game. Simple but with a personal touch <3 Scenography gets to settle an ambient of a little robot that searches for friendship and music helps on it!  Recomment ! :B

One of those throw things at things angry birds style physics games except this one perhaps is a bit more puzzle-like and requires a bit more planning about how your shots will ricochet off things. The game is also really really nice looking and and I can recommend it over other birdslikes just based on the amount of style it exudes.
